news.title: The rise of Japan's far right was supercharged by Trump - and tourists

news.title: Nurses to 'overwhelmingly' reject pay deal as strike vote looms
news.summary: The Royal College of Nursing has been holding a consultative vote on their 3.6% pay rise.

news.title: Taser trial for prison officers to tackle violence
news.summary: Ministers will look at whether the electric stun guns should be more widely used after the trial.

news.title: Lionesses to be welcomed back to UK with Downing Street reception
news.summary: But there are no plans for a bank holiday to mark the victory, BBC News understands.

news.title: The Papers: 'You were roarsome!' and 'Queens of Europe'
news.summary: The Lionesses' thrilling victory over Spain in the Euros final dominates Monday's papers.

news.title: US-EU tariff deal a big Trump win but not a total defeat for Brussels
news.summary: The agreement is a major step in Trump's plan to shake up global trade, which he says is weighted against America.
